title: IS_PED_INJURED
content:
0x84A2DD9AC37C35C10x2530A087// IsPedInjured
BOOL IS_PED_INJURED(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The ped to check for injuries.Returns: Returns true if the ped is injured, false otherwise.Indicates whether this ped's health is below its injured threshold.
The default threshold is 100, these are stored in the pedhealth.meta file located in common:\data\Below are some of the valuesInjuredHealthThresholdName100.000000Strong100.000000Average100.000000Weak
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for IS_PED_INJURED
IsPedInjured(ped)
